英文公告.機關名稱: South District Project Office,Department Of Rapid Transit System
英文公告.標案名稱: Taipei MRT Wanda-Zhonghe-Shulin Line Phase I Environmental monitor works during construction period
英文公告.附加說明: 1.Basic Qualificaitons(1)This is a service procurement. The tenders shall be qualified as one of the following: a. Profession Engineering Firm, b.Engineering Consultant Company, c.No-profit Organization, d. Educational Institute, e.Environmental Monitoring Business.(2)Personnel Qualifications:A.Project ManagerOne personnel to serve as the project manager shall have a minimum, the following qualifications:(a)A bachelor’s degree.(b)10 years Environmental Engineering Technical Services with Environmental Monitoring Experience.B.Chief EngineerTwo personnel to serve as Chief Engineers for Eastern and Southern Region Engineering Offices respectively shall have a minimum, the following qualifications:(a)A bachelor’s degree.(b)5 yars Environmental Engineering Technical Services with Environmental Monitoring Experience.C.Professional Environmental EngineerOne of the above mentioned Personnel (Project Manager and Chief Engineers) shall be a registered Professional Environmental Engineer and shall in charge of the certification of the related works for this project.2.Particular Qualications:The tender shall complete related environmental monitoring services in the last 5 years calculated from the end of submitting date regarding the contract amount fulfilled the following conditions:A.No less than 1,300,000 NT dollars for single contract; or,B.No less than 3,400,000 NT dollars for cumulated contract amount.3.A.Tender Closing Date: July 2, 2012B.Tender Opening Time: July 3, 2012C.Tender Awarding Date: July 20, 2012

決標資料.履約執行機關: 機關代碼：3.79.51.3機關名稱：臺北市政府捷運工程局南區工程處
決標資料.附加說明: 1.艾奕康工程顧問股份有限公司於101年7月11日經本採購案評選委員會評選決議，並於101年7月13日簽奉處長核定為優勝序位第1名，依評選須知第6條第3項第4款第5目之規定，取得與本處優先議價資格。2.艾奕康工程顧問股份有限公司依本處101年7月16日北市南工字第10160849401號函所規定地點與時間，出席議價會議。3.艾奕康工程顧問股份有限公司報價為新臺幣38,466,400元整，超出本處核定底價，經該商第1次減價，報價為新臺幣38,460,000 元整，超出本處核定底價；經該商第2次減價為願以底價承作（本處核定底價：新臺幣37,832,000元整），主持人依法當場宣布決標。
